titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the alternative fuel and alternative fuel mixture credits for black liquor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/19/2009--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny the alternative fuels excise tax credit for fuels (including lignin, wood residues, or spent pulping liquors) derived from the production of paper or pulp.
